rewritten.title: Trump Told to Put the Cash Back: Minority and LGBTQ+ Health Research Funding to be Restored
rewritten.rewritten: In a turn of events that's as refreshing as it is necessary, former US President Donald Trump has been instructed to bring back funding for health research targeting minority and LGBTQ+ communities. This important sector of scientific study, previously left in the dust by Trump's administration, can now breathe a sigh of relief as financial support gears up to kick back into action.
rewritten.summary: Former President Trump has been directed to reinstate funding for health research that focuses on minority and LGBTQ+ communities.
